price: Na uchochezi wa Shet'ani ukikuchochea basi omba ulinzi wa Mwenyezi Mungu. Hakika Yeye ni Msikizi, Mjuzi.
arabic: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
footnotes: Na Shetani akikuchochea kwa wasiwasi ili apate kukuachisha ulio amrishwa, kama vile kukasirika kwa kukushikilia kwao mambo ya shari, basi omba ulinzi wa Mwenyezi Mungu akuepushe naye huyo Shetani. Kwani Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kusikia na kujua kila linalo tokea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-immā yanzaghannaka mina al-shayṭāni nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
translations: an evil suggestion comes to you
